content.raw:
I'll update house 1 in separate pull-request in the gazebo-models repository.

The primary point of this pull-request is to test real-time factors. Thanks for your data point, we'll continue testing and tweaking.

Fixed standpipe collision.

valve collision is now a triangle mesh.

Gas station is same as House 1.

renamed `manifest.xml` to `model.config`

I'll take a deeper look at the terrain.
content.html:
I'll update house 1 in separate pull-request in the gazebo-models repository.

The primary point of this pull-request is to test real-time factors. Thanks for your data point, we'll continue testing and tweaking.

Fixed standpipe collision.

valve collision is now a triangle mesh.

Gas station is same as House 1.

renamed manifest.xml to model.config

I'll take a deeper look at the terrain.
